summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 29
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Wednesday, with 18 gaining and none declining.
Bitcoin rose 3.4% to $28,398 by market close.
